languages.text: If an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a Navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all of these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy under the effect of any Executioner's DoT effect is Bleeding, any type of Burning (including from Pyromancy or Navigator) and is under any type of Toxin (including from Biomancy) at the same time, all DoTs deal 30% more damage to him.

If an enemy under any Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} is suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

If an enemy under any Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} is suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

If an enemy suffering from any of the Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a Navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all of these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

If an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a Navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all of these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

If an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a Navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all of these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

languages.text: Si un enemigo que sufre cualquiera de los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} continuado del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} tiene {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (incluyendo los efectos de los talentos de piromante y navegante) y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (incluyendo los efectos de los talentos de biomante) al mismo tiempo, todos estos efectos de daño continuado le infligen +30 % de daño adicional.
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a Navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all of these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Si un enemigo que sufre cualquiera de los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} continuado del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} tiene {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (incluyendo los efectos de los talentos de piromante y navegante) y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (incluyendo los efectos de los talentos de biomante) al mismo tiempo, todos estos efectos de daño continuado le infligen +30 % de daño adicional.

languages.text: 何らかの{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の継続{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けている敵が同時に{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}（パイロマンサーや航宙士が与える効果を含む）、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}状態にある（バイオマンサーに与えられた攻撃を含む）場合、これらすべての継続ダメージ効果はその敵に+30%のダメージを与える。
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a Navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all of these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: 何らかの{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の継続{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けている敵が同時に{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}（パイロマンサーや航宙士が与える効果を含む）、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}状態にある（バイオマンサーに与えられた攻撃を含む）場合、これらすべての継続ダメージ効果はその敵に+30%のダメージを与える。

languages.text: 当敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的任意持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果影响时，若同时还受到{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（包括火焰系灵能者与导航者施加的效果）、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（包括生物系灵能者施加的效果）效果影响，则上述所有持续伤害效果对该名敌人造成的伤害提高30%。
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a Navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all of these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: 当敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的任意持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果影响时，若同时还受到{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（包括火焰系灵能者与导航者施加的效果）、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（包括生物系灵能者施加的效果）效果影响，则上述所有持续伤害效果对该名敌人造成的伤害提高30%。

languages.text: Wird ein mit {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}-über-Zeit-Effekten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henkers{/g} belegter Gegner gleichzeitig mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (einschließlich der Effekte von Pyromantikern oder Navigatoren) und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} (einschließlich der Effekte von Biomantikern) belegt, fügen ihm alle genannten Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte +30 % Schaden zu.
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a Navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all of these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Wird ein mit {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}-über-Zeit-Effekten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s belegter Gegner gleichzeitig mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (einschließlich der Effekte von Pyromantikern oder Navigatoren) und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} (einschließlich der Effekte von Biomantikern) belegt, fügen ihm alle genannten Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte +30 % Schaden zu.

languages.text: Si un ennemi souffrant d'un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} progressifs infligé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} subit simultanément les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (y compris ceux infligés par un pyromancien ou un navigateur) et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (y compris ceux infligés par un biomancien), tous ces effets de dégâts progressifs lui infligent +30 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a Navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all of these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Si un ennemi souffrant d'un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} progressifs infligé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} subit simultanément les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (y compris ceux infligés par un pyromancien ou un navigateur) et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (y compris ceux infligés par un biomancien), tous ces effets de dégâts progressifs lui infligent +30 % de dégâts supplémentaires.

languages.text: Если на противника, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} наложил какой-либо эффект периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, одновременно действуют {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (в том числе наложенное пиромантом или навигатором) и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (в том числе наложенное биомантом), урон от этих эффектов для этого противника увеличивается на 30%.
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a Navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all of these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.

traits.locale_text: Если на противника, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} наложил какой-либо эффект периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, одновременно действуют {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (в том числе наложенное пиромантом или навигатором) и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (в том числе наложенное биомантом), урон от этих эффектов для этого противника увеличивается на 30%.

Если на противника, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} наложил какой-либо эффект периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, одновременно действуют {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (в том числе наложенное пиромантом или навигатором) и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} (в том числе наложенное биомантом), урон от этих эффектов для этого противника увеличивается на 30%.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}'ın zamanla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren herhangi bir etkisinden muzdarip olan bir düşman, aynı anda {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} (ateşbazların veya Rotacıların sebep olduğu etkiler de dâhil) ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksinden{/g} (biyobazların sebep olduğu etkiler de dâhil) muzdaripse tüm bu zamanla hasar veren etkiler o düşmana +%30 fazla hasar verir.
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a pyromancer or a Navigator), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (including the effects inflicted by a biomancer) at the same time, all of these damage-over-time effects deal +30% more damage to that enemy.
